Description:
Continuation of the popular series of virtual racing GRID created with the wishes of the vast community of fans, work on the game was conducted in close collaboration with professional athletes and experts racing magazine Autosport.

Feel like a real professional, participating in classical and modern forms of racing! In GRID Autosport, competing for the laurels of the winner, you will not only try to get around opponents, but also to satisfy the ambitions of its sponsors. It is important to every change in your ranking position, and any race can be decisive.

In career mode GRID Autosport you can specialize in a particular discipline or try yourself in all - and each is a great experience! Feel strong voltage circuit racing, take part in the long night endurance races, which will be a serious test of the quality of the tires of your iron horse, demonstrate the skill of driving open-wheel and show what you can, in extreme street races or contests on the tuned cars .
Features
Different types of events and disciplines, including circuit races, endurance races, drifting, race single-seater, modified cars, supercars and prototypes.
22 locations and more than hundreds of different trails.
A huge car park and ample opportunities for modification of any machine.
Multiplayer competition in the RaceNet, uniting millions of players, weekly specials and team "clan" of the race.
